snippet.title: Little Nightmares III – Friendship Trailer
snippet.description:
In the darkest of places, you ought to think twice before letting a friend down.

Little Nightmares III is coming to PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC in 2025.

https://bnent.eu/LN3-FriendshipTrailer
